attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: repeal all discrimination laws on the grounds they are inequitably enforced by politically correct minded people to help minorities and not enforced to root out all discrimination, including that against majorities. They are also abused by some in the minority groups to gain an often unfair and unjust advantage and this abuse goes unchecked.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
